attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for murders
attributes.additional_details:
We must stop this culter of allowing prisoners to be alive after taking a inocent life like Ian Brady to stay alive after killing 5 inocent children and baby p.Two terrible crimes and there murders are still alive which is disgusting also why should the people who killed soldier Lee Rigby stay alive after killing him.

In conclusion if you want people who murder and hurt peoples lives please sign my petion
